Get Verified

Your Police Clearance Application Process

START YOUR VERIFICATION HERE

Emirates ID Verification

Application Process

  • Fill out the online application form with your basic details.
  • Select your country of residence from the dropdown menu.
  • Verify your identity through a secure OTP sent to your mobile number.
  • Await approval and processing of your application by the authorities.
  • Once approved, your identity will be verified.

WE ARE VERIFYING ALL UAE STATES.

In an ongoing commitment to safety and security, the UAE has implemented a rigorous nationwide verification system.

This system ensures thorough identification and validation of individuals across the country, contributing to a secure environment for both residents and visitors.

  • Email: mail@dubailegalcheck.ae
  • Address: P.O. Box 1493 Dubai- United Arab Emirates
